The minor is not open to Biology majors.

courseSection0.text: The minor is not open to Biology majors.

li.Grades below \"C\" (2.0) in each course: Grades below "C" (2.0) in each course are not accepted in the minor.
li.At least 15 hours used in the minor must: At least 15 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the Department of Biology.
li.Students must satisfy each course's prer: Students must satisfy each course's prerequisites before enrolling in the class.

courseSection0.text:
Minor Requirements
Grades below "C" (2.0) in each course are not accepted in the minor.
At least 15 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the Department of Biology.
Prerequisite Courses
Students must satisfy each course's prerequisites before enrolling in the class.

courseSection0.text0:
Complete the following: 
BSC2010C - Biology I (4)
BSC2011C - Biology II (4)
CHM2045C - Chemistry Fundamentals I (4)
CHM2046 - Chemistry Fundamentals II (3)
CHM2210 - Organic Chemistry I (3)
PCB3023 - Molecular Cell Biology (3)
PCB3044 - Principles of Ecology (3)
PCB3063 - Genetics (3)
PCB4683 - Evolutionary Biology (4)
courseSection0.text1:
Chemistry Placement score  may substitute for CHM2048C.
Chemistry Placement Test ~ https://www.sdes.ucf.edu/placement-tests/ may substitute for CHM2045C

li.Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study: Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.

courseSection0.text:
Restricted Electives

None

Total Undergraduate Credit Hours Required: 31

courseSection1.text:
Other Requirements

Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.
